reviewText: This is in Spanish and does not work on regular DVD players. I did not read the details properly.
I first saw this movie on TV.  I loved it!  The settings and music are wonderful.  I want to go to London to see Tower Bridge because of this movie.

great drama, but I would have preferred it in English.
thank you

The instructions for my Blu-Ray player say it's supposed to play PAL and NTSC discs, but it refuses to even load the two discs in this set.  This is a wonderful mini-series, so why in the world won't they make it in a Region 1 format for us fans of Stefanie Powers and Barry Bostwick?
NOT IN ENGLISH....why are we unable to get one in English
